long_description: Travel with more clothing in less space with the Eagle Creek Pack-It Folder 18. The folder compresses 8-12 shirts, pants and sweaters and minimizes wrinkles, too. 18-in. clothing folder fits into most carry-on bags. Holds 8-12 items: shirts, pants, jackets and bulkier items such as sweaters. Comes with helpful folding instruction board. Eagle Creek Pack-It Folder 18 has a quick-grab handle. Part of Eagle Creek's Pack-It System (other folders and cubes sold separately).
short_description: Travel with more clothing in less space with the Eagle Creek Pack-It Folder 18. The folder compresses 8-12 shirts, pants and sweaters and minimizes wrinkles, too.
